channel.title: Posts on SLIME
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SLIME

item.title: Some Thoughts About an AI DM
item.description: An idea for a new project has been eating at my mind recently (despite my inability to finish the myriad other ones I’ve started) so I thought I would try to commit some of my ideas and thoughts about the technical challenges to writing here.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Today I got this site up and running using Hugo. I’m mainly hoping to use it as a place to write about my experiences working on my projects, and to put info about those projects.
